entries.source: Chat Edit: 'ERROR: PlatformMenuEntry.display() must be called with a window. still not working'

Chat Edit: 'I would like to add some buttons to my bar on the left side, I want clicking on them to open a program of my choosing, and the buttons to be represented by a nerd font character (of my choosing). Also, if the program is already open, I would like a visual indictor that the program is already open. Also, if the program is already open, I want clicking on the button to have niri jump to that program on screen.'
